Metadata.Title: The god-mothers: Kill order
Metadata.Description: The God-Mothers, an advanced group of theives meeting up to plan their biggest hesit yet -  they are located in spain to crack The Romonoskvo family vault. This belongs to a family of wealthy oil tycoons and Mrs Lana Romonoskvo has hired us to take these criminals out before their fortune dwindles. If this misson is successfully completed, their will be a hefty transfer of money into yout bank account, 47. Are you up for the challenge?
